column1: Little Goat Diner////Goat O Goat O salad 4.5/5 stars: I had the salad with dressing and wontons on the side because my body desperately needed the veggies. It was a big bowl of raw veggies and freaking delicious shrimp. Loved it. Would definitely order it again if I wanted a big bowl of healthy goodness. Tried my friends
